text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump Far be it from me to call you a liar...
… well, not that far.

The same week that the feds seized tests from Illinois, Fisher Island, Florida ("an exclusive enclave of multi-million dollar condos and homes") was able to test every resident & their staff.
https://t.co/fyMwMin0N8 https://t.co/H1xZmY2wd8
